message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems fair for a first round.
I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more than your initial offer.  Let's settle this quickly.
Bob, we're losing money with every round.  I'll compromise a bit, but this needs to be settled soon.
Alice, this is starting to get ridiculous. We both lose if this goes on much longer. Meet me in the middle.
